Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget.`` That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the Robert Horrys are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

Basketball- Allen Iverson will rehabilitate his right calf in the U.S. after being examined by a surgeon. The former NBA MVP will not require surgery but his calf has a calcium deposit and secondary bleeding. It's tricky because of the location, Andrews said as quoted by AP.`` So we're going to try to treat it without surgery.'' Allen Iverson is leaving his current team, Besiktas of the Turkish League.
